StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_RemoveDEPDischarge]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int, @ContractID int, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
DECLARE @DBID int DECLARE @DBNAME sysname DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100)
DECLARE @CandidateStatusID int DECLARE @SSN char(9)
SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT @DBID = DB_ID(), @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID AND DISCHARGE_CODE IS NOT NULL AND DISCHARGE_DATE IS NOT NULL) BEGIN --- CLEAR THE DISCHARGE REASON AND DISCHARGE DATE UPDATE CONTRACT SET DISCHARGE_CODE = NULL, DISCHARGE_DATE = NULL, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID AND DISCHARGE_CODE IS NOT NULL AND DISCHARGE_DATE IS NOT NULL
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN SELECT @SSN = P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER FROM PERSON P INNER JOIN NWA N ON (P.PERSON_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND N.NWA_ID = @NWAID)
SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred removing the DEP Discharge record for SSN ' + @SSN + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
--- UPDATE THE USER LOGIN IN CANDIDATE STATUS FOR THE CURRENT STATUS RECORD SET @CandidateStatusID = dbo.GetMaxStatusID(@NWAID)
UPDATE CANDIDATE_STATUS SET USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin WHERE CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = @CandidateStatusID
--- DELETE THE DEP DISCHARGE RECORD FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS DELETE FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS WHERE CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = @CandidateStatusID
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN SELECT @SSN = P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER FROM PERSON P INNER JOIN NWA N ON (P.PERSON_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND N.NWA_ID = @NWAID)
SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred dele.ng the status record for SSN ' + @SSN + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 4, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
